title: Wanted: Specimen of Apollonia by Takis Katsoulidis
content:
Wanted: Specimen of Apollonia by Takis Katsoulidis

I may be missing something obvious but I don’t seem to be able to find one online. Or even a place to buy it. Any suggestions?

 [‹ How do you type unicode symbols?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320064415/http:/typophile.com/node/43278 "Go to previous forum topic") [Anyone know this one? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320064415/http:/typophile.com/node/43323 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content:
You can find it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320064415/http:/www.fonts.gr/epst%5F2005/EPST_2005_pg1_48.pdf) (p. 21)

George Triantafyllakos - backpacker.gr
